configuration.subject: ​{{stringEmptyHandler newReferral.referredUser.firstName onEmpty='A friend'}}​ helped you get one step closer to €{{format-reward 'REFERRER'  includeContextualText=false}}!

content.headerContent:
#Good News!
Your friend has signed up for a free account with {{companyName}}!
content.bodyContent: {{stringEmptyHandler newReferral.referredUser.firstName onEmpty='A friend'}}​ is currently trying out {{companyName}}. As a thank you from us, if they become a paying user, you will automatically receive €{{format-reward 'REFERRER'  includeContextualText=false}}
content.shareCTA: Keep sharing your code and earn more discounts - **{{user.referralCode}}**

configuration.subject: Congrats! You have earned a {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true}} free reward with {{companyName}}

content.headerContent:
#Congratulations
You have earned a reward with {{companyName}}!
content.giftcardBodyContent: You have now earned {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}}. You should receive an email shortly with instructions for redemption.
content.bodyContent: You have now earned {{format-reward 'REFERRED' includeUnit=true includeContextualText=true}} with {{companyName}}.
content.shareCTA: Keep sharing your code and earn more discounts - **{{user.referralCode}}**

configuration.subject: You have hit the reward limit!

content.headerContent:
#Reward Limit
You have successfully referred the maximum!
content.bodyContent: Thanks for spreading the word about {{companyName}}. You've referred so many new people that you've earned the maximum number  of available rewards.
content.shareCTA: However, you can keep referring new users and giving €{{format-reward 'REFERRED'  includeContextualText=false}} with your code. - **{{user.referralCode}}**
